resource.string: Show the PIN/ADM status and enable or disable PIN1.

Usage:
{}$ {}
Example: - pin PIN1 Enabled: Yes PIN1 Verified: Yes ADM Verified: Yes PIN1 Retries: 3 ADM Retries: 10
- pin pin1=1234 PIN1 disabled success
PIN1 Enabled: No PIN1 Verified: N/A ADM Verified: Yes PIN1 Retries: 3 ADM Retries: 10
Invalid PIN1 code, ignore enable/disable PIN1 operation.
